name: Delivery Paradise July '22 (Year 1.2)
description:
Delivery Paradise! July '22 (Year 1: Month 2)

* Local multiplayer: Wired controllers recommended (ps5/ps4/switch/xbox) *

This is a game I made for my friends, and I plan to make more! (2 - 8 players) (has not been tested with more than 4 people)

Work for an exciting delivery company that wows customers with their deliveries. Toss and kick the package to the customers door without it letting it touch the ground!

Music has not been added yet so I recommend playing something in the background.

How to play:

There are 2 modes out right now. DELIVERY and PACKAGEBALL.

To start a game, all players must pick a color (and team if applicable).

DELIVERY - Get the package to the porch without letting it hit the ground or any hazardous obstacles. The only other rule is that a player is not allowed to hit twice in a row. You have 3 lives, and obstacles increase after each successful delivery. See how many deliveries you can complete!

PACKAGEBALL - "Volleyball with no rules!" Hit order doesn't matter here. You can jump over the fence. Just get the package to break on the other team's lawn!

Controls (Keyboard/PS5):

  • Alt+F4: Quit the game (button doesn't work yet)
  • WASD/Left stick: Move.
  • J/Square: Bump. (toss the package straight up)
  • K/Triangle: Volley. (toss the package up and forward)
  • Spacebar/Cross: Jump.
  • L/Circle: Dive. (good for saving the ball, but slow at the end)
  • U/R2: Spike. (strong and slow, hits the package downward)
  • I/R1: Kick. (strong and slow, hits the package straight forward)

I am developing another game for my friends to play, but I do intend to keep working on Delivery Paradise! This is a prototype, but here are the intended features that will be added later on:

  • Add quit game button functionality.
  • Survival Mode: Set in a box style arena. Players must take turns to keep the package in the air as long as they can while avoiding incoming hazards.
  • [Delivery Mode] More types of obstacles.
  • [Delivery Mode] Timer.
  • [Packageball] Set a score to reach that will end the game.
  • [Packageball] Match timer.
  • [Packageball] Add game end screen.
  • How to play screen.
  • Controls screen.
  • One loop music track each for the game modes.
  • [itch.io] maybe i'll make a trailer/how-to-play for the webpage

Known bugs (to be fixed later)(feel free to comment some down below):

  • [Delivery Mode] Unknown sequence of events causes situation where no one is allowed to hit the package.
  • [General] Getting bopped in the head with the package can cause you to get stuck into the ground. Jump to get out!
  • [General] Players getting stuck into walls and corners when hit. Will address in future games as well.

I plan to record gameplay of me and my friends for this game and future monthly games later. Be sure to check out the YT!
